about_the_game:
Annelise lives in the year 2100.

In a burning flame, one morning like many others, she glimpses a female figure absolutely identical to her.



From that moment her life will change.

She'll have to know why she can see the other her but she can't speak to her.
She'll have to search for informations on ancient tomes.
She'll have to solve puzzles and pass trials.
She'll have to learn how to harness ancient powers.

And in the meantime she will learn about the existence of a prophecy, of an angry Supreme God, of the arrival of Four Plagues dooming the world.

She will understand to be part of something totally unexpected and too big for her to manage.

And that somewhere in time, she is not alone.



Join Annelise in her quest to get and empower the epic Pyrite Talisman and to develop new powers to counter the curse.
Break the barrier of time separating Annelise from the other Her and share the knowledge to progress.

The Pyrite Talisman is a 3D graphic adventure involving exploration in third person direct movement, puzzle solving and inventory use through a point & click interface. During gameplay you will play with both characters switching through time to collect informations to progress further into the story.
Subtitles and interface in english and italian.

Join in to save two worlds !
detailed_description:
Annelise lives in the year 2100.

In a burning flame, one morning like many others, she glimpses a female figure absolutely identical to her.



From that moment her life will change.

She'll have to know why she can see the other her but she can't speak to her.
She'll have to search for informations on ancient tomes.
She'll have to solve puzzles and pass trials.
She'll have to learn how to harness ancient powers.

And in the meantime she will learn about the existence of a prophecy, of an angry Supreme God, of the arrival of Four Plagues dooming the world.

She will understand to be part of something totally unexpected and too big for her to manage.

And that somewhere in time, she is not alone.



Join Annelise in her quest to get and empower the epic Pyrite Talisman and to develop new powers to counter the curse.
Break the barrier of time separating Annelise from the other Her and share the knowledge to progress.

The Pyrite Talisman is a 3D graphic adventure involving exploration in third person direct movement, puzzle solving and inventory use through a point & click interface. During gameplay you will play with both characters switching through time to collect informations to progress further into the story.
Subtitles and interface in english and italian.

Join in to save two worlds !

name: The Pyrite Talisman

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1GB video card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 2GB video card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Telluria is an ancient world bound to a terrible curse by an angry Overgod. A young girl by the name Annelise is the Chosen One and somewhere in time she is not the only One. Join Annelise in her quest to break through time and space to get and empower the epic Pyrite Talisman to counter the curse.
